short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stop social media from hijacking your attention â€” counteract manipulative design patterns with subtle content changes and filters.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension gently modifies online content and filters out intrusive designs, helping you maintain your focus without completely blocking your online experience.

Current features:
- Grayscaling
- Media blurring with optional unblur (right-click context menu)
